feat(demo): implement complete demo marketplace with vibrant UI and smooth animations

## Features Implemented

### Core Demo Infrastructure
- Mock data generation with 20+ professional request templates (@faker-js/faker)
- Auto-simulation loop (45-second cycle) for realistic marketplace activity
- Zustand store for global state management
- Real-time event system with activity stream
- Complete TypeScript strict mode compliance

### Pages & Routes
- Dashboard page with stats cards and activity stream
- Browse page with filtering and grid layout
- Request details page with offer submission
- Demo navigation bar with exit link
- Accessible from landing page "Try Demo" CTA

### Visual Design System
- **Color-coded filters**: 10 unique skill gradients (React/cyan, TypeScript/blue, Python/yellow, etc.)
- **Urgency indicators**: Icons and color themes (low/steel, normal/warning, critical/error)
- **Interactive animations**: Staggered card entrance, hover lift effects, spring physics
- **Background glows**: Emerald, pink, and indigo radial gradients
- **Gradient UI elements**: Text headings, icon badges, buttons, slider thumbs
- **shadcn/ui components**: Card, Button, Badge, Dialog throughout

### Components
- `DashboardStats`: 6 gradient stat cards with trend indicators
- `ActivityStream`: Live feed with Lucide icons and gradient badges
- `RequestCard`: Interactive cards with hover glow and color-coded tags
- `RequestFilters`: Vibrant filter sidebar with animated selections
- `OfferModal`: shadcn Dialog for offer submission
- `DemoBanner`: Dismissible demo mode indicator

### Animations (Framer Motion)
- **Staggered entrance**: Cards appear sequentially (100ms delay)
- **Spring physics**: Natural, bouncy transitions (stiffness: 300, damping: 25)
- **Layout animations**: Smooth repositioning when filters change
- **AnimatePresence**: Graceful exit animations for removed cards
- **Hover effects**: Scale + lift on card hover, icon wiggles
- **Empty state**: Animated search icon pop and fade-in

### Technical Improvements
- Extended Tailwind config with demo colors and urgency scale
- Added date-fns for time formatting
- Integrated sonner for toast notifications
- Zero custom CSS (100% Tailwind utilities)
- Responsive design with mobile-first approach
- Fixed z-index stacking for proper layering

## Bug Fixes
- Fixed route structure (moved from (demo) to demo folder)

- Fixed z-index issues causing hidden request cards
- Resolved nested animation conflicts
- Added explicit animation states for visibility

- zustand: State management
